entry.title: WIND WARNING ENDED, Comox
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:06 PM PST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 9.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Comox Airport 10:00 PM PST Thursday 05 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 9.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 80 %
Dewpoint: 6.4°C
Wind: SSE 33 km/h gust 57 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Temperature steady near 7.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections this evening. Wind becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 05 January 2023
